item.title: Disney Theatrical Group’s Thomas Schumacher Will Depart Longtime Leadership Role This Month (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Thomas Schumacher, a leading force in growing Disney Theatrical Group into one of the most successful and influential theater producers on Broadway and around the world, will step down as DTG’s chief
